content: I think I'll start with **The Good Fight**. I've heard great things about Christine Baranski's performance, and I'm intrigued by the show's timely commentary on current events. Since I've been reading People magazine every week for the past three months, I appreciate how the show tackles real-world issues in a thoughtful and engaging way. Can you tell me more about Christine Baranski's character, Diane Lockhart, and her role in the show?
